name: @jscad/scad-api
description: OpenSCAD like modeling api for OpenJSCAD & co

scripts.release-patch: git checkout master; npm version patch; git commit -a -m 'chore(release): created release'; git push origin master --tags
scripts.release-minor: git checkout master; npm version minor; git commit -a -m 'chore(release): created release'; git push origin master --tags
scripts.release-major: git checkout master; npm version major; git commit -a -m 'chore(release): created release'; git push origin master --tags
